Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits the use of polystyrene containers by restaurants and food vendors
Summary: Relates to prohibiting the use of polystyrene containers by restaurants and food vendors.
LawCode: Add ยง399-eee, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the use of polystyrene containers by restaurants and food vendors
